ygData.subject: Re: Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I did the quest last night. I still got the drum, and about 1 gold. However, the drums now sell for only about 6.5 silver so making money this way is no longer
ygData.messageBody:
I did the quest last night. I still got the drum, and about 1 gold. However,
the drums now sell for only about 6.5 silver so making money this way is no
longer possible. It is a great way to get your first drum however. I think
that's what the quest was really supposed to be about originally.

Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:

> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <slide@...>
>
> The quest is there - it just doesn't give a drum any more....
>
> Slyde of Xegony
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 10:06 AM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Quests
>
> >
> > I thought the "Drums-to-gold" quest had been disabled?
> >
> > Talies the Wanderer
> >
